Qshort_F: Je ne pensais pas que l’incident était assez grave.
Qshort_E: I did not think the incident was serious enough.

Qshort_E: The individual left or changed jobs.

Qshort_E: I had concerns about the formal complaint process (e.g., confidentiality, how long it would take).

Qshort_E: I did not believe it would make a difference.

Qshort_E: The time limit to file a grievance or a formal complaint had passed.
